comment.author: 63385174@N06
comment._content: Very short shadows and people waiting in the shade at left - must be high summer and a very hot day.

comment.author: 51979177@N02
comment._content: The motor vehicle looks like a ca. 1910 model something...zoom in at the purl and you can see that it sports an Automobile Association badge (AA within a laurel wreath with wings above)...this 1909 Talbot has some similarities...but it's not a match - www.flickr.com/photos/sgplewka/3519852388/ ...the vehicle parked near the Supreme Court buildings might be easier to identify...it looks a bit like one of these - www.flickr.com/photos/homer----simpson/7808942552/
